        "Your task is to write a short, clear, and informative **English summary** of the image.
"

img_summary: The image shows a scene from a video game set in a snowy, forested environment. A character is engaged in combat with an entity named "Old Ginseng Guai," as indicated by the health bar at the bottom of the screen. The character is wielding a glowing staff and appears to be standing on a patch of twisted roots. Various game interface elements are visible, including health and stamina bars, and icons for abilities or items located at the bottom corners of the screen. The background features snow-covered trees and rocks.
